title: Cavaliers star Donovan Mitchell plus Koby Altman and JB Bickerstaff
description:
Donovan Mitchell joins The Woj Pod to discuss his blockbuster trade to the Cleveland Cavaliers, the Knicks trade that never happened, the end in Utah and much more. Plus: Cavs' President Koby Altman inside the deal talks and coach JB Bickerstaff on Mitchell's impact on his starry roster. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Adrian Wojnarowski
